bandaragama, marawa pradeshayedi gawayeku prawahanaya kala sukhopabhogi wan rathayak polis niladharin wisin nawathwimata sangnya kirimedi ehi siti pirisak wisin ema polis niladharinta wedi thabimata uthsahakara thibenawa.ada (18) aluyama mema siduwima siduwa athi athara ehidi polisiya perala sidukala wedi thabimedi wan rathaya atulugama, marawa pradhana margaye dama sakakaruwan palagos thibuna.apa warthakaru sandahan kale ehi thibi ti 56 wargaye gini awiyak saha pihiyak polisiya wisin soyagena athi athara pudgalayin siw denekuge pawahan hamuwi athi bawayi.wan rathaye ankaya wyaja lesa wenas kara thibu bawada ehi himikaru panadura uthura pradeshaye padinchikaruweku bawada me wanawita anawaranaya wi thibenawa.ema pudgalayin kalak thisse gawa jawarame niratha wi athi bawayi polisiya prakasha kale.bandaragama polisiya wisin sakakaruwan handunagena athi athara athadanguwata ganime meheyum me wanawita kriyathmakayi.

kal maks prakashakarana aakarayata aagama samawitama panthi sahitha samajayak nirmanaya kirimata ha ehi palaka panthiya aaraksha kirimata weheseyi.aagama wisin wahala prewnidasaya menma nirdhanaya thamata upathin himiwu thathwayema radi sitimata upades deyi.thama ese ipadimata hethuwa dewa kamaththa ho karmaya bawa aagama uganwayi.aagama magin dhanathmaka chinthanayata wada runathmaka chinthanaya wapuruwayi.minisa wisinma nirmanaya kala aagamata siyalu balaya labadi aagame wahalakuwi minisa jiwathwima nisa minisage tharkitha chinthanaya nirmanathmakabhawaya motawiyayi.aagama samawitama pawathna thathwaya wenaskirimata nowa eethulama gali sitimata upades deyi.idiri gamana walakwayi.ebawin maks prakasha karanne minisa aagama nirmanaya kalada aagama minisawa nirmanaya nokaranabawayi.ebawin makswadaya anugamanaya kala ratawal wegayen diyunuwu bawath aagama ha sanskruthiya thula aligali siti samajayan sahitha ratawal thawamath diyunuwemin pawathina ratawal lesath pawathinabawa makswadi wishleshakayo awadharanaya karayi.
